Description.Text: A place to relax and take it easy, where you can start the day immersed in greenery, enjoy a cocktail or an aperitif, socialize after dinner or wind down in the afternoon. The bar at the Hotel Rafael has a large garden where you can take some time out in the morning or the afternoon, and simply go for a stroll to work off the stress of the day amidst the palm and olive trees that will help you to leave the chaos of the big city far behind you. The Raffaello bar complements the broad range of facilities at the hotel with its exclusive setting, professional, expert staff and vast, comprehensive selection of services and amenities. Open from 6:30 a.m. to 11:00 p.m.

The Hotel Rafael welcomes visitors to the capital of Lombardy. It is a new, impressive, modern building and its location near the San Raffaele Hospital means that it has excellent links with the city and the main transport networks.

It is an ideal base for researchers attending scientific seminars and conferences, and for business men and women looking for a quiet, discreet place to stay. Its broad range of guests appreciate the great care taken over the layout and the impeccable taste shown in the refined, comfortable surroundings.

On the wall of the restaurant, a reproduction of the work of the great Raphael shows how art and cuisine can come together in the refinement of a welcoming, discreet and elegant environment. The wealth of dishes, products and traditions from all over Italy in the menu are meticulously prepared by our chef and presented at the table like real works of art, offering pleasures for the palate and the eyes. Providing an enchanting backdrop to the Restaurant, the large garden can be used to host lunches, dinners, banquets and events. The Raffaello Restaurant will add a sophisticated touch to your stay in Milan, providing you with a matchless experience of art and good taste. Open from 12:30 p.m. to 2:30 p.m. and from 7:00 p.m. to 10:00 p.m. Buffet breakfast from 7:00 a.m. to 10:00 a.m.

A discreet, discerning and elegant setting for meetings, lunches and dinners. ?Il Raffaello? lounge at Hotel Rafael is an exclusive setting designed to offer maximum privacy for formal and informal occasions. It is entirely illuminated with natural light and can host up to 10 people. This elite venue is available for reservations and allows you to establish the times and means for your meetings. Personalized menus are available on request.
